mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION( reserv_num, user_tel1, user_tel2, user_tel3, reserv_start_date, reserv_start_time, reserv_end_date, reserv_end_time, ccar_car_id, reserv_insurance, user_id) values(#{reservNum}, #{userTel1},#{userTel2},#{userTel3}, TO_DATE(#{reservStartDate},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'), TO_DATE(#{reservEndDate},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'), #{ccarCarId}, #{reservInsurance}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from CAR_CATEGORY order by car_category_num
mapper.insert: insert into PAYINFO(pay_no, reserv_num, user_tel1, user_tel2, user_tel3, pay_method, pay_money, pay_condition, pay_regdate) values(#{payNo}, #{reservNum}, #{userTel1}, #{userTel2}, #{userTel3}, #{payMethod}, #{payMoney}, #{payCondition}, TO_DATE(#{payRegdate},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'))
